code:
import Cookies from'js-cookie';import{client}from'./client';// url
import{householdIndex}from'../urls';// interface
// 利用履歴一覧の取得
export var getAllSpending=function getAllSpending(userId,householdId){if(!Cookies.get("_access_token")||!Cookies.get("_client")||!Cookies.get("_uid"))return;return client.get("".concat(householdIndex(userId),"/").concat(householdId,"/spendings"),{headers:{"access-token":Cookies.get("_access_token")||"","client":Cookies.get("_client")||"","uid":Cookies.get("_uid")||""}});};// 利用金額月合計の取得
export var getSpendingTotal=function getSpendingTotal(userId,householdId,params){if(!Cookies.get("_access_token")||!Cookies.get("_client")||!Cookies.get("_uid"))return;return client.get("".concat(householdIndex(userId),"/").concat(householdId,"/spendings/total"),{params:params,headers:{"access-token":Cookies.get("_access_token")||"","client":Cookies.get("_client")||"","uid":Cookies.get("_uid")||""}});};// 利用履歴の登録
export var createSpending=function createSpending(userId,householdId,params){if(!Cookies.get("_access_token")||!Cookies.get("_client")||!Cookies.get("_uid"))return;return client.post("".concat(householdIndex(userId),"/").concat(householdId,"/spendings"),params,{headers:{"access-token":Cookies.get("_access_token")||"","client":Cookies.get("_client")||"","uid":Cookies.get("_uid")||""}});};// 利用履歴の編集
export var updateSpending=function updateSpending(userId,householdId,spendingId,params){if(!Cookies.get("_access_token")||!Cookies.get("_client")||!Cookies.get("_uid"))return;return client.patch("".concat(householdIndex(userId),"/").concat(householdId,"/spendings/").concat(spendingId),params,{headers:{"access-token":Cookies.get("_access_token")||"","client":Cookies.get("_client")||"","uid":Cookies.get("_uid")||""}});};// 利用履歴詳細の取得
export var getSpending=function getSpending(userId,householdId,spendingId){if(!Cookies.get("_access_token")||!Cookies.get("_client")||!Cookies.get("_uid"))return;return client.get("".concat(householdIndex(userId),"/").concat(householdId,"/spendings/").concat(spendingId),{headers:{"access-token":Cookies.get("_access_token")||"","client":Cookies.get("_client")||"","uid":Cookies.get("_uid")||""}});};// 利用履歴の削除
export var deleteSpending=function deleteSpending(userId,householdId,spendingId){if(!Cookies.get("_access_token")||!Cookies.get("_client")||!Cookies.get("_uid"))return;return client.delete("".concat(householdIndex(userId),"/").concat(householdId,"/spendings/").concat(spendingId),{headers:{"access-token":Cookies.get("_access_token")||"","client":Cookies.get("_client")||"","uid":Cookies.get("_uid")||""}});};
